name: nugget
short_effect: Sell for 5000 Pokédollars, or to Ore Collector for 10000 Pokédollars.

flavor_text.black_white: A nugget of pure gold that gives off a lustrous gleam. It can be sold at a high price to shops.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A nugget of pure gold that gives off a lustrous gleam. It can be sold at a high price to shops.
